targets.expr: sum(rate(ingress_nginx_${metric}_responses_total{job="nginx-ingress-controller", controller=~"$controller", app=~"$app", node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace", ingress=~"$ingress", service=~"$service", service_port=~"$service_port", vhost=~"$vhost", location=~"$location", content_kind=~"$content_kind"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum(label_replace(rate(ingress_nginx_${metric}_responses_total{job="nginx-ingress-controller", controller=~"$controller", app=~"$app", node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace", ingress=~"$ingress", service=~"$service", service_port=~"$service_port", vhost=~"$vhost", location=~"$location", content_kind=~"$content_kind"}[$__rate_interval]), "status_group", "${1}xx", "status", "([0-9])..")) by (status_group)
  / scalar(sum(rate(ingress_nginx_${metric}_responses_total{job="nginx-ingress-controller", controller=~"$controller", app=~"$app", node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace", ingress=~"$ingress", service=~"$service", service_port=~"$service_port", vhost=~"$vhost", location=~"$location", content_kind=~"$content_kind"}[$__rate_interval]))) > 0

sum(rate(ingress_nginx_${metric}_requests_total{job="nginx-ingress-controller", controller=~"$controller", app=~"$app", node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace", ingress=~"$ingress", service=~"$service", service_port=~"$service_port", vhost=~"$vhost", location=~"$location", content_kind=~"$content_kind"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum(rate(ingress_nginx_${metric}_requests_total{job="nginx-ingress-controller", controller=~"$controller", app=~"$app", node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace", ingress=~"$ingress", service=~"$service", service_port=~"$service_port", vhost=~"$vhost", location=~"$location", content_kind=~"$content_kind"}[$__rate_interval])) $by > 0

sum(rate(ingress_nginx_${metric}_requests_total{job="nginx-ingress-controller", controller=~"$controller", app=~"$app", node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace", ingress=~"$ingress", service=~"$service", service_port=~"$service_port", vhost=~"$vhost", location=~"$location", content_kind=~"$content_kind"}[$__rate_interval])) $by
  / scalar(sum(rate(ingress_nginx_${metric}_requests_total{job="nginx-ingress-controller", controller=~"$controller", app=~"$app", node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace", ingress=~"$ingress", service=~"$service", service_port=~"$service_port", vhost=~"$vhost", location=~"$location", content_kind=~"$content_kind"}[$__rate_interval]))) > 0

sum(rate(ingress_nginx_${metric}_received_bytes_sum{job="nginx-ingress-controller", controller=~"$controller", app=~"$app", node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace", ingress=~"$ingress", service=~"$service", service_port=~"$service_port", vhost=~"$vhost", location=~"$location", content_kind=~"$content_kind"}[$__rate_interval])) * 8

sum(rate(ingress_nginx_${metric}_received_bytes_sum{job="nginx-ingress-controller", controller=~"$controller", app=~"$app", node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace", ingress=~"$ingress", service=~"$service", service_port=~"$service_port", vhost=~"$vhost", location=~"$location", content_kind=~"$content_kind"}[$__rate_interval])) $by * 8 > 0

sum(rate(ingress_nginx_${metric}_sent_bytes_sum{job="nginx-ingress-controller", controller=~"$controller", app=~"$app", node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace", ingress=~"$ingress", service=~"$service", service_port=~"$service_port", vhost=~"$vhost", location=~"$location", content_kind=~"$content_kind"}[$__rate_interval])) * 8

sum(rate(ingress_nginx_${metric}_sent_bytes_sum{job="nginx-ingress-controller", controller=~"$controller", app=~"$app", node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace", ingress=~"$ingress", service=~"$service", service_port=~"$service_port", vhost=~"$vhost", location=~"$location", content_kind=~"$content_kind"}[$__rate_interval])) $by * 8 > 0

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(ingress_nginx_${metric}_request_seconds_bucket{job="nginx-ingress-controller", controller=~"$controller", app=~"$app", node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace", ingress=~"$ingress", service=~"$service", service_port=~"$service_port", vhost=~"$vhost", location=~"$location", content_kind=~"$content_kind"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le)) * 1000

histogram_quantile(0.9, sum(rate(ingress_nginx_${metric}_request_seconds_bucket{job="nginx-ingress-controller", controller=~"$controller", app=~"$app", node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace", ingress=~"$ingress", service=~"$service", service_port=~"$service_port", vhost=~"$vhost", location=~"$location", content_kind=~"$content_kind"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le)) * 1000

histogram_quantile(0.5, sum(rate(ingress_nginx_${metric}_request_seconds_bucket{job="nginx-ingress-controller", controller=~"$controller", app=~"$app", node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace", ingress=~"$ingress", service=~"$service", service_port=~"$service_port", vhost=~"$vhost", location=~"$location", content_kind=~"$content_kind"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le)) * 1000

sum(rate(ingress_nginx_${metric}_request_seconds_sum{job="nginx-ingress-controller", controller=~"$controller", app=~"$app", node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace", ingress=~"$ingress", service=~"$service", service_port=~"$service_port", vhost=~"$vhost", location=~"$location", content_kind=~"$content_kind"}[$__rate_interval]))
  / sum(rate(ingress_nginx_${metric}_request_seconds_count{job="nginx-ingress-controller", controller=~"$controller", app=~"$app", node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace", ingress=~"$ingress", service=~"$service", service_port=~"$service_port", vhost=~"$vhost", location=~"$location", content_kind=~"$content_kind"}[$__rate_interval]))
  * 1000

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(ingress_nginx_${metric}_upstream_response_seconds_bucket{job="nginx-ingress-controller", controller=~"$controller", app=~"$app", node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace", ingress=~"$ingress", service=~"$service", service_port=~"$service_port", vhost=~"$vhost", location=~"$location", content_kind=~"$content_kind"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le)) * 1000

histogram_quantile(0.9, sum(rate(ingress_nginx_${metric}_upstream_response_seconds_bucket{job="nginx-ingress-controller", controller=~"$controller", app=~"$app", node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace", ingress=~"$ingress", service=~"$service", service_port=~"$service_port", vhost=~"$vhost", location=~"$location", content_kind=~"$content_kind"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le)) * 1000

histogram_quantile(0.5, sum(rate(ingress_nginx_${metric}_upstream_response_seconds_bucket{job="nginx-ingress-controller", controller=~"$controller", app=~"$app", node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace", ingress=~"$ingress", service=~"$service", service_port=~"$service_port", vhost=~"$vhost", location=~"$location", content_kind=~"$content_kind"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le)) * 1000

sum(rate(ingress_nginx_${metric}_upstream_response_seconds_sum{job="nginx-ingress-controller", controller=~"$controller", app=~"$app", node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace", ingress=~"$ingress", service=~"$service", service_port=~"$service_port", vhost=~"$vhost", location=~"$location", content_kind=~"$content_kind"}[$__rate_interval]))
  / sum(rate(ingress_nginx_${metric}_upstream_response_seconds_count{job="nginx-ingress-controller", controller=~"$controller", app=~"$app", node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace", ingress=~"$ingress", service=~"$service", service_port=~"$service_port", vhost=~"$vhost", location=~"$location", content_kind=~"$content_kind"}[$__rate_interval]))
  * 1000

sum by (container)
  (
    (
      sum by(pod, container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu",unit="core",node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
      -
      sum by(pod, container) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{node=~"$node", container!="POD", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
    )
  )

sum by (container)
  (
    (
      (
        sum by(pod, container) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{node=~"$node", container!="POD", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
        -
        sum by(pod, container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu",unit="core",node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
      ) or sum by(pod, container) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{node=~"$node", container!="POD", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
    )
    > 0
  )

sum by (container)
  (
    (
      sum by(namespace, pod, container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory",unit="byte",node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
      -
      sum by(namespace, pod, container) (avg_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes:without_kmem{node=~"$node", container!="POD", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
    ) > 0
  )

sum by (container)
  (
    (
      (
        sum by(pod, container) (avg_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes:without_kmem{node=~"$node", container!="POD", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
        -
        sum by(pod, container) (avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="memory",unit="byte",node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
      ) or sum by(pod, container) (avg_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes:without_kmem{node=~"$node", container!="POD", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
    )
    > 0
  )

sum by (persistentvolumeclaim) (
    max_over_time(kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
  )
  * on (persistentvolumeclaim)
	sum by (persistentvolumeclaim) (
		label_replace(
			max_over_time(
				kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]),
				"persistentvolume", "$1", "volumename", "(.*)")
				+ on (persistentvolume) group_left() max by (persistentvolume) (kube_persistentvolume_is_local == 0)
	)
-
sum by (persistentvolumeclaim) (
    max_over_time(kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]) - max_over_time(kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
  )
  * on (persistentvolumeclaim)
	sum by (persistentvolumeclaim) (
		label_replace(
			max_over_time(
				kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]),
				"persistentvolume", "$1", "volumename", "(.*)")
				+ on (persistentvolume) group_left() max by (persistentvolume) (kube_persistentvolume_is_local == 0)
	)

sum by ( persistentvolumeclaim) (
    max_over_time(kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]) - max_over_time(kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
  )
  * on (persistentvolumeclaim)
	sum by (persistentvolumeclaim) (
		label_replace(
			max_over_time(
				kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]),
				"persistentvolume", "$1", "volumename", "(.*)")
				+ on (persistentvolume) group_left() max by (persistentvolume) (kube_persistentvolume_is_local == 0)
	)
/
  sum by (persistentvolumeclaim) (
    max_over_time(kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])
  )
  * on (persistentvolumeclaim)
	sum by (persistentvolumeclaim) (
		label_replace(
			max_over_time(
				kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]),
				"persistentvolume", "$1", "volumename", "(.*)")
				+ on (persistentvolume) group_left() max by (persistentvolume) (kube_persistentvolume_is_local == 0)
	)

panels.description: Shows health per partition and pod
panels.title: Health

targets.expr: (sum(rate(zeebe_dropped_request_count_total{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", partition=~"$partition"}[1m])) by (partition) / sum(rate(zeebe_received_request_count_total{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", partition=~"$partition"}[1m])) by (partition) ) * 100

panels.title: Completed Processes in avg overtime per sec
Completed Tasks in avg overtime per sec
Requests handled by Gateway per sec
Processing per Partition skipped or processed
Number of unprocessed jobs by specific worker

query.query: label_values(ingress_nginx_${metric}_info{job="nginx-ingress-controller", controller=~"$controller", app=~"$app", node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace", ingress=~"$ingress", service=~"$service", service_port=~"$service_port", vhost=~"$vhost", location=~"$location"}, content_kind)

label_values(ingress_nginx_${metric}_requests_total{job="nginx-ingress-controller", controller=~"$controller", app=~"$app", node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace", ingress=~"$ingress", service=~"$service", service_port=~"$service_port", vhost=~"$vhost", location=~"$location", content_kind=~"$content_kind"}, method)

label_values(ingress_nginx_${metric}_responses_total{job="nginx-ingress-controller", controller=~"$controller", app=~"$app", node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace", ingress=~"$ingress", service=~"$service", service_port=~"$service_port", vhost=~"$vhost", location=~"$location", content_kind=~"$content_kind"}, status)

label_values(ingress_nginx_${metric}_backend_info{job="nginx-ingress-controller", controller=~"$controller", app=~"$app", node=~"$node", namespace=~"$namespace", ingress=~"$ingress", service=~"$service", service_port=~"$service_port", vhost=~"$vhost", location=~"$location"}, pod_ip)
